nodes.text: Anyone displaying the level of paranoid thinking displayed in the above post should be a natural for a senior NRA position, or committal.

You're obviously an Obama supporter, they're the only people who wouldn't be upset at his abusive tactics of threatening lawsuits against anyone that runs unfavorable ads against him, thus showing that he doesn't support the First Amendment.

Hey Penfold, I have to agree with Issly, because it has already been done here. It happened in New Orleans during catrina, the only difference is what Happened in New Orleans never went nationwide as it will if Obama is elected. The NRA called Obama up and invited him to go on a bear hunt, Obama agreed to go but said he wanted nothing to do with a gun though, Obama said he would only be an observer of the bear being hunted. The NRA then asked Obama if he went unarmed and found himself face to face with an angry bear how he would handle the situation, Obama replied' I will enter into direct peace negotiations with the bear, if that fails I will place sanctions on him. People who support obama are like sheep being led to slaughter. You better wake up and do the background research on Obama before you make the biggest mistake of your life by voting for that idiot. You can view the New Orleans gun confiscation video on you tube or the NRA web-site either one.
Folks that see threats everywhere they look are already slaves to their paranoia.

I think you are mis reading what he said. His statement is more about preparedness than seeing threats everywhere. I think the paranoia fits with the anti gunners more so than the gun owner. The anti gunner sees every gun owner as a threat. Where the gun owner doesn't see a threat but prepares for one
And folks that refuse to see the legitimate ones put us all at risk. Touche.

The frequency of legitimate ones doesn't warrant my walking around armed all the time IMO. How does my being unarmed put you at risk? Think I should be prepared to shoot someone for you in case of emergency? Touchee yourself.
